#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <time.h>
int array[1024][1024];
int main(){
	int N = 1024;
	printf("%d\n", N);
	int count = 0;
	for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
		for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {
			array[i][j] = count;
			count++;
		}
	}
	srand(time(NULL));
	for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
		for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {
			int ran1 = rand() % N;
			int ran2 = rand() % N;
			int temp = array[i][j];
			array[i][j] = array[ran1][ran2];
			array[ran1][ran2] = temp;
		}
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
		for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {
			if (j != N - 1)
				printf("%d ", array[i][j]);
			else
				printf("%d", array[i][j]);
		}
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
